title: Circle CEO says that AI bots are transacting USDC, creating wallets
description:
Circle CEO Jeremy Allaire said May 25 that artificial intelligence (AI) bots are engaging with his company’s USDC stablecoin. AI and blockchain are a match Allaire wrote on Twitter: “[Artificial intelligence] and Blockchains are made for each other… We are already hearing about AI Bots spinning up on-chain wallets and using USDC.” Allaire did not […]

The post Circle CEO says that AI bots are transacting USDC, creating wallets appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: WEF urges global cooperation for effective crypto regulation
description: In a recent white paper on crypto asset regulation, the World Economic Forum (WEF), in collaboration with its Digital Currency Governance Consortium, highlighted the urgent need for regulatory measures and emphasized the importance of global cooperation in addressing the challenges posed by cryptocurrencies. WEF calls for global crypto regulation The WEF paper stressed the necessity ... Read more

title: How is Twitter User Base Helpful in Analyzing an NFT Project?
description: Twitter has become an invaluable platform for gathering real-time information and discussing various topics. In recent years, non-fungible tokens (NFTs) have gained immense popularity, revolutionizing the art and collectibles market. With Twitter’s vast user base and unique ability to disseminate information rapidly, it has emerged as a powerful tool for analyzing and understanding NFT projects. ... Read more

title: How to Benefit from Little-known Investment Strategies that the Pros Use
description: Cryptocurrencies are attracting investors seeking lucrative opportunities in the digital asset space.
